meanings.definition: Extreme in degree, strength, or effect.
meanings.sent1: The sun's intensest rays burned brightly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: She felt the intensest joy when she saw her family after a long time.
meanings.sent3: The intensest heat made the ice cream melt in seconds.
meanings.sent4: His intensest desire was to reach the mountain's summit.
meanings.sent5: The intensest storm raged outside, shaking the windows.

meanings.definition: Characterized by strong emotions or feelings.
meanings.sent1: The intensest love filled her heart when she held her newborn baby.
meanings.sent2: His intensest fear was spiders crawling on the walls.
meanings.sent3: The intensest excitement bubbled up inside her as she waited for the concert to start.
meanings.sent4: Her intensest anger flared up when she discovered the betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The intensest happiness spread through the room as they celebrated together.

meanings.definition: Requiring or showing intense effort or concentration.
meanings.sent1: Studying for the intensest exam of the year kept her up all night.
meanings.sent2: The intensest focus was needed to complete the intricate puzzle.
meanings.sent3: His intensest concentration was broken by the loud noise outside.
meanings.sent4: The intensest dedication was required to master the difficult skill.
meanings.sent5: The intensest effort paid off when she finally crossed the finish line.
